MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML6 postcode area of Airdrie, affecting properties in Forrest Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.05pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a confirmed underground cable fault on Forrest Street and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:49PM on Friday 13 November 2020.
